values: 繁荣，茂盛，兴旺；挥舞，舞动；炫耀
To flourish means to do very well and be in an excellent condition.
The Roman Empire flourished in Europe two thousand years ago.
n. 兴旺；茂盛；挥舞；炫耀；华饰
vi. 繁荣，兴旺；茂盛；活跃；处于旺盛时期
vt. 夸耀；挥舞
v. to grow well 繁茂
v. to be very successful 兴旺
v. to hold up and show in an excited or proud way 炫耀
繁荣
